definition: room/work unit/grave/scabbard/family or clan/one of the 28 constellations of Chinese astronomy

sentences.english: With no wind indoors, for example, sweat will not evaporate as effectively.
sentences.chinese: 比如说室内无风，就不能有效蒸发汗水。

sentences.english: A C.O. fills a cup of coffee in the Guard Room.
sentences.chinese: 在警卫室内，一个狱警在倒咖啡。

sentences.english: MV, LV Swgr & Distribution Transformers for Phases 1 & 2 and Indoor Lighting of Beijing Shooting Range Hall.
sentences.chinese: 北京射击馆的的配电系统和室内照明的定单。

sentences.english: Objective To analyze the in-doors air condition and the factors affecting the air quality of Guangzhou metro.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解影响广州地铁室内空气质量的主要因素。

sentences.english: The curtains do not match with the decoration.
sentences.chinese: 窗帘与室内装璜不相配。

sentences.english: Pudong Development Bank Pudong Branch Office Interior Design, 4,500 sqm.
sentences.chinese: 上海埔东发展银行埔东分行室内设计。

sentences.english: In the same year, the territory's first public indoor garden show in the opening scissors Lane.
sentences.chinese: 同年，境内第一座公共室内戏园在剪子巷开业。

sentences.english: The loan money will be used in the inner decoration.
sentences.chinese: 申请的贷款将用于室内装潢。

sentences.english: The interior decoration of this house is really good.
sentences.chinese: 这户人家的室内装修真是没说的。

sentences.english: Many biological and non-biological factors have polluted indoor air.
sentences.chinese: 室内空气常被许多生物和非生物因素污染。

sentences.english: We had to stuff the ventilator shafts up to stop the smoke entering the room.
sentences.chinese: 为了阻止烟进入室内，我们只好把通风道堵起来。

sentences.english: Wash repellent-treated skin with soap and water after coming indoors.
sentences.chinese: 驱蚊洗治疗皮肤用肥皂和水以后，在室内。

sentences.english: Finally, this paper presents a long-term vista over the application of indoor wireless sensor networks.
sentences.chinese: 最后展望了室内无线传感器网络技术的应用前景。

sentences.english: A gymnasium was added to the indoor stadium.
sentences.chinese: 在室内体育馆里为学生增建健身室。

sentences.english: Comparison of Indoor thermal Envionment by the Different Construction of Stone-slab Houses …
sentences.chinese: 不同类型石板屋工法对于室内温热环境之比较。

sentences.english: The permeability of saline soils is studied in laboratory.
sentences.chinese: 对含盐土的渗透系数进行了室内试验研究。
